root.message: The QUALITY_ASSMNT field for indicator 3-3-1, translated into en
root.data: Results are routinely compared to empirical evidence when available. These empirical data include research studies, household surveys with incidence measurement, and longitudinal HIV surveillance sites when available. If inconsistencies are found modifications are considered for the models. Methods are also published in peer-reviewed journals every two years. See links to publications at www.epidem.org.
